io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets

Class TextTable.Column.Memento

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets.TextTable.Column.Memento
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    TextTable.Column

    protected class TextTable.Column.Memento
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable

    Memorizes the mutable fields of its enclosing class and restores them on restore() or close().

    As this class implements Autocloseable, it can be used in a try-with-resources construct in RAII manner as follows:

    
 \@SuppressWarnings("try") // to prevent the compiler from complaining
 void preserveColumnSettings() {
     try(Column.Memento ignore = column.new Memento()) {
         // do things that modify the fields `column`
     }
     // at this point all fields of `column`  will have their values from before the try statement
 }

      protected Memento()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Restore the mutable fields of the enclosing class to the values captured at the time of instantiation.

      Restore the mutable fields of the enclosing class to the values captured at the time of instantiation.
